attributes.action: Keep South Beds District Council as a separate unitary authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government plan to scrap South Beds District Council and give all powers to Luton. We are outraged that our identity as residents of South Bedfordshire is being taken from us without any consultation, and ask the Prime Minister to reverse the proposal for Luton Borough Council to make decisions regarding South Bedfordshire towns and villages. Luton is a separate unitary authority and it should be kept that way. Let South Beds keep its identity - we don't want to be a part of Luton!
